comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I think the gentleman on the left is the German Consul-General, Dr. Rudolf Asmis. See this illustrated article - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16924082.

comment.author: 15088225@N07
comment._content: Certainly looks like him, good detective work beachcomber!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Wow absolutely! These gentlemen are very distinctive in their looks - makes it much easier! Off to update the records now :)
